title: Suspenseful and Clever
review: The story draws you into the cast of crazy characters living in the same apartment complex. Who hasn't lived with "interesting " and sometimes annoying neighbors who are somewhat like family. The acting Veteran actors Jack McGee, Sally Kirkland and Martin Cove are superb. The remaining cast intertwine their quirky characters into a funny yet suspenseful story of found money. You start rooting for these guys to benefit from happenstance . Who hasn't thought they deserve good luck as much as the corporate world??
